title: Hextech Chests not dropping
body: The first month that they were available I got 3 of the 4 hextech chests, since then myself and teammates have received 10-15 S ratings and I have not been awarded a single chest. I've gotten 7 S's this week with no chests. What's the deal?

replies.poster: Q r a f T e e
replies.body: If this is you (http://quickfind.kassad.in/profile/na/Will%C3%BF/ ), then it's likely because you play Morgana the majority of the time. You can only earn a chest from S- or higher ranking with one champion per season.

To add a bit more information about this, you can find all of the nitty gritty details in our [Hextech Crafting Article](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/207884233)!

Hope this helps!  ^.^
